Package com.islandpower.configurator.controller

Class ComponentController

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.controller.ComponentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/components") public class ComponentController extends Object
Controller for managing various components.

Provides endpoints for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting different component types such as solar panels, controllers, batteries, and inverters.

  • Method Details

    • getAllComponents

      @GetMapping("/{type}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<?>> getAllComponents(@PathVariable String type)
      Retrieves all components of a specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of component (e.g., "solar-panels", "controllers", etc.)
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<List<?>> - a list of all components of the specified type

    • getComponentById

      @GetMapping("/{type}/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getComponentById(@PathVariable String type, @PathVariable String id)
      Retrieves a specific component by its ID.
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of component
      id - - the ID of the component
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<?> - the component or a NOT_FOUND status if it does not exist

    • createComponent

      @PostMapping("/{type}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createComponent(@PathVariable String type, @RequestBody Object componentData)
      Creates a new component of a specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of component
      componentData - - the data for the new component
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<?> - the created component or a BAD_REQUEST status if the type is invalid

    • updateComponent

      @PutMapping("/{type}/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateComponent(@PathVariable String type, @PathVariable String id, @RequestBody Object componentData)
      Updates an existing component by its ID.
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of component
      id - - the ID of the component
      componentData - - the new data for the component
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity<?> - the updated component or a NOT_FOUND status if it does not exist

    • deleteComponent

      @DeleteMapping("/{type}/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteComponent(@PathVariable String type, @PathVariable String id)
      Deletes a component by its ID.
      Parameters:
      type - - the type of component
      id - - the ID of the component
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity - a NO_CONTENT status if successful or NOT_FOUND if it does not exist
